panels.content:
# Attestation Processing Metrics

Metrics regarding `BeaconChain::process_attestation`, which processes `Attestation` from the network (but not in blocks).

Collected from the [`beacon_chain`](https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/tree/master/beacon_node/beacon_chain) crate.

options.content:
# Beacon Processor Metrics

The `BeaconProcessor` queues consensus messages from the network (gossip + rpc) and manages a set of worker tasks which consume those queues.

This is how consensus messages get from the network to the beacon chain.

panels.content:
### Gossip Verification Times


Times to verify the attestation before re-gossiping

options.content:
### Work Events


Stats about the work events that are being received by the manager process.
